rules.description: Right Option Key → Hyper Key #1 (⌃⇧⌥⌘) (Mac OSX → hyper key 1)
Caps Lock → Hyper Key #2 (⌃⇧⌘) (Mac OSX → hyper key 2)
Tab → Hyper Key #3 (⌃⌘) (Mac OSX → hyper key 3)
Double tap right ⇧ key → caps lock on
left cmd + double tap q → close application (Mac OSX → close application)
disable cmd + h so that it does not minimise windows (Mac OSX → disable minimise window)
fn + l → Lock Screen (Mac OSX → lock screen)
fn + s → Screen Saver (Mac OSX → screen saver)
Fn + Space → Emoji Menu (Mac OSX → emoji menu)
left shift → search symbols (VS Code → search symbols)
fn → search files (VS Code → search files)
left ctrl + button 3 → search files (VS Code)
left ctrl → cmd + b to hide sidebar (VS Code → hide sidebar)
left option → cmd + j to hide terminal (VS Code → hide terminal)
right shift → cmd + j, cmd + b to hide panes (VS Code → hide panes)
Caps Lock Hyper Key + a → cmd + p (VS Code → search files)
right cmd → zen mode (VS Code → zen mode)
right cmd → zen mode (VS Code → zen mode)
left option → cmd + k (Slack → launch search)
Mouse Button 3 → Launch Search (Slack)
mouse button 3 → Chrome Developer Tools (Google Chrome)
left ctrl + Mouse Button 3 → Chrome Developer Console (Google Chrome)
left option + Mouse Button 3 → Chrome Developer Elements Panel (Google Chrome)
left shift + mouse button 1 → Cut (Adobe Premiere Pro)
mouse button 2 → ripple trim to previous edit playhead (Adobe Premiere Pro)
Adobe Premiere Pro timeline: scroll timeline with mouse button 3 (hold button 3 to scroll; release to go back to selection tool)
OpenAI: New chat with mouse button 3 (OpenAI: New chat)
OpenAI: delete chat history with shift + mouse button 3 (OpenAI: Delete chat history)
Hyper Key sublayer "b"
Hyper Key sublayer "a"
Hyper Key sublayer "r"
Hyper Key sublayer "x"
